name: Burning Mountain
description:
This game, including all art, writing, and music, was made in 48 hours for the first Extra Credits game design jam. You can view the source code for this project on Github: https://github.com/jeremycryan/ExtraCreditsJam2018

You know in older adventure style games where you reach a prompt that says "you can't do that?" Well this game is kind of like that. 

You essentially play as the Navi of this story: a helpful sprite who occasionally interjects during the adventure of a dauntless hero. You may aid him, you may advise him, but regardless of what you say or don't say, he will be marching forward like the hero he is.

A interactive story with ramping excitement, heavy emphasis on emotion, and simplistic gameplay.

Note: A post-jam version of this game is available for download. It has no new content, script, or art, but has a few bugfixes and usability improvements. Read changelogs.txt in the download for a complete list of changes.

Art: Janet Figueroa
